bill.title: Relating To Statutory Revision: Amending Or Repealing Various Provisions Of The Hawaii Revised Statutes Or The Session Laws Of Hawaii For The Purposes Of Correcting Errors And References, Clarifying Language, Or Deleting Obsolete Or Unnecessary Provisions.
bill.description: Amends or repeals various provisions of the Hawaii Revised Statutes or the Session Laws of Hawaii for the purposes of correcting errors and references, clarifying language, or deleting obsolete or unnecessary provisions. (SD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to JHA, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Tuesday, 02-08-22 2:00PM in House conference room 325 Via Videoconference.

The committees on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, Lowen, McKelvey, Nakamura, Takumi, Todd, Tokioka, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) D. Kobayashi, LoPresti.
Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 797-22), recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Passed Second Reading; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Matayoshi, McDermott, Todd excused (3).
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Matayoshi, McDermott, Nakashima excused (3). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 176).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-18-22 9:30AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 7 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Keohokalole, Acasio, Gabbard, Kim, Lee, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3348) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-28-22.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 553) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 360).
House Conferees Appointed: Matayoshi Chair; Belatti, Ward.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 718).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Rhoads Chair; Gabbard, Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 893).
House Conferee(s) discharged.
Received notice of discharge of conferees (Hse. Com. No. 807).
Reconsideration of action taken on 03-29-22.
Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 810).
Deferred one day 05-03-22.
House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 822).
Transmitted to Governor.

votes.desc: House Judiciary & Hawaiian Affairs: Passed, Unamended
